file_content.text: Our purposes crossed over nicely, Sith. Rathari's reign has ended, and the Cartel has full control of its affairs again.
You have defeated Lord Rathari, and his reign on Nar Shaddaa has ended.
You wagered on yourself. Ybann the Hutt suspects you knew the deck was stacked in your favor.
Let that be a lesson to you, Ybann. Always bet on me.
After this display, I doubt I will find any takers foolish enough to bet against you.
Don't try to slime your way out of paying.
Do not insult me. I always make good on my bets.
It was a sucker bet, Ybann.
Oh-hoh-hoh-hoh. It won't be the last time Ybann makes a bad bet.
Both you and the Cartel have benefited from today. We appreciate your efforts and skill. Please leave us to our business.
Oh-hoh-hoh-hoh. Lord Rathari still lives and breathes. Perhaps you have doubts about facing him.
